title: Black Friday UK 2015 - Tesco, Asda and Amazon one day deals predicted
text:
Black Friday UK 2015 - Tesco, Asda and Amazon one day deals predicted Black Friday UK 2015 - Tesco, Asda and Amazon one day deals predicted The US imported shopping bonanza Black Friday hits the UK on November 27 2015 and deals are predicted to be bigger than ever, as more big name retailers in Britain slash prices for one-day only. PUBLISHED: 20:55, Sun, Oct 18, 2015 | UPDATED: 17:24, Mon, Oct 19, 2015 GETTY Black Friday is November 27 2015 and set to be just as big as last year 
Asda, Argos, Tesco, Marks and Spencer, John Lewis, Boots, and Amazon are just some of the big name brands set to offer special promotions again in 2015. 
Black Friday is the day after the American bank holiday Thanksgiving and when shoppers in the US typically start Christmas spending. The so-called following 'Cyber' Monday is thought to be the biggest day for online buying. In the last few years, brands have extended offers to UK shoppers over the Black Friday weekend and through to Cyber Monday, which has prompted more and more retailers to get in on the act. 
Currys and PC World has promised that in 2015 its Black Friday sale will be smoother than ever, and is set to drop the cost of everything from TVs and laptops, to washing machines and fridges. 
And John Lewis chairman Sir Charlie Mayfield has said that sales will be more "thoughtful" this year. 
The British retailer appeared to caught a little off guard by Black Friday last year, as it cut prices with the slogan: "If our competitors have a sale, we have a sale". Related articles
